Name: Boomer Remover
About the game: Your name is Ludwig Sanders. You were born in 1995 and people chose you as a leader of the Generation Z. The spread of a highly contagious virus that affects brains has ushered in the breakdown of society. Slay the whole population of older, senile, hoarders of toilet paper in order to save the future generations from low self esteem, broken promises and uncultured yet uneducated perspectives of the world. It's time for boomers to know their place. Graveyard that is . Kill them all! Key features: 9 Weapons, ranging from a Flamethrower to a Minigun. Dismemberment System (Bend them boomers in and out!) Destructive Objects Explosions, Blood, Guts & more! Retro-Aesthetic Camera Effect Late 90's & early 00's vibe Work in progress: Campaign Mode Ability to drive vehicles and run over boomers Gun Game Mode Wave Survival Mode
